root.name: Chernobyl: Terrorist Attack
root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimum Operating System: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4Ghz RAM Memory: 1 GB HDD Space: 4 GB available Video Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible 128MB with PS 3.0 support (GeForce 8600 or faster) Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible, 16-bitDisc Drive 16X CD/DVD Drive
